GPS Auto Drone

GPS Auto Drone
$20.00$99.00
4.2 815 Reviews

Capture stunning 4K visuals, fly further with a 22KM range, and enjoy extended flight times, all while navigating safely with advanced Tri-Detect Obstacle Sensing.

1" CMOS Camera: Capture 4K videos and 20MP photos with 6X zoom and 90° FOV.

Omni Obstacle Sensors:  Front, rear, and downward obstacle detection for safer flights.

102-Minute Flight Time: Enjoy up to 102 minutes with dual 5000mAh batteries for extended flying.

Multiple Flight Modes: Enjoy Vertical Shooting, Follow Me, Hyperlapse, and more for creative shots.

Complete Accessory Kit: Includes 2 batteries, charger, carry bag, propellers, and cables.

Flight time, range, and performance may vary based on environment, battery, and usage. Follow local regulations and ensure responsible flying at all times. Specifications and included accessories are subject to change. Environmental factors can impact performance; check conditions before flying.

Fastest delivery Tomorrow, 22 March.Order within 5 hrs 56 mins.
